instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-00165: What is 820-00165? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Clean ME Bios file needed -
threads.message: Does anyone have or can direct me to a BIOS dump file with clean ME region for this  board. Thanks in advance!

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Clean ME Bios file needed -
threads.message: Welp... I caved and bought it. If anyone needs it PM me.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Clean ME Bios file needed -
threads.message: Should be already uploaded on the forum, more than one time...

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Clean ME Bios file needed -
threads.message: I only found a couple posts with the same link results. One doesnt work and the other belongs to a member that hasn't been active for some time . Thanks for the help.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Clean ME Bios file needed -
threads.message: Upload your backup somewhere, to clean ME region...

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Clean ME Bios file needed -
threads.message: It's all good, I found one somewhere else. Board is fixed.
